pr_title: Create the default database if it does not exist when opening the catalog

timeline.message: Create the default database if it does not exist when opening the catalog

timeline.bodyText: Does this do what you want? It seems like if the intent is IF NOT EXISTS then you should ignore the DatabaseAlreadyExistException.
timeline.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: Okay, I see that it delegates. When would this throw DatabaseAlreadyExistsException then? Is this just to ignore a checked exception?
replies.author: rdblue

replies.bodyText: Yeah, it delegates the DatabaseAlreadyExistsException, in theory it should not throw this exception.  I noticed this before, we could just ignore it here.
replies.author: openinx

timeline.bodyText: Should this be metadata instead of comments? I think that it could contain other properties, right?
timeline.author: rdblue

timeline.bodyText: Nit: other statements use all caps for SQL reserved words. Should this be SHOW TABLES?
timeline.author: rdblue
